heading: Today
text: Any flurries north ending this morning.  Partly sunny in southern valleys.  Clouds giving way to increasing periods of sun in northern valleys, lingering most of the day across the mountains.  A bit colder.  Highs in the 20s, from 20 to 30 north to south.  Winds northwest near 10 mph, gusting to 25 mph.

heading: Tonight
text: Mostly clear, mixing with some clouds late.  Lows in the single numbers, a few low teens south, and cold spots zero to 5 below.  Winds diminishing to light and variable.

heading: Friday
text: Sunshine, mixing with some afternoon clouds.  Highs from the low 20s to low 30s north to south.  Winds light, mainly northwest less than 10 mph.
